questions.question: A single column manometer is connected to a pipe containing liquid of specific gravity 0.8 as shown in the figure. If the ratio of area of Manometer to the area of reservior is 1/93. The Manometer fluid is mercury. Find the pressure in the pipe. Take the values of h1 = 21 cm, h2 = 45 cm. Refer the figure in the simulator
